website_summaries.verdict: A 4-tier serving tray that consists of a simple, clear acrylic, so your food is the star of the show.
pros: Entire stand pulls apart quickly and easily, and all of the pieces fit inside a carrying bag for convenience
With 4 inches of space between the 4 tiers, accessing the items on display is easy
cons: Not stable enough to hold heavy items without wobbling

customer_reviews.title: Just get it, great, stable, well made product!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is well made, stable I am comfortable putting the cupcakes or pastries on display for our Wedding Shower. Love the storage bag so we can keep it protected and ready for use again and finally I loved the tips the company sent for care and storage. This is our second purchase as we are regular cupcake, grab and go desserts people!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wife bought this. She got a lot more compliments on the square tier than the round one. The square tier was taller, so she was able to fit taller packaged/bagged cupcakes on them. It was classy. Better to be able to utilize space going up than on your table and not be able to serve all pastries! It was a win! She Just wishes it had a wider base for her to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LB Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. It held 50 regular size cupcakes and additionally a 6 inch cake at the top. Was very easy to assemble and break down. Came with a bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Mccafn

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Strong, good design. No complaints, just a suggestion. Would like the center philips screw converted to a hand twisted type, but they do include the tool you need to put this together. That said, easy to put together and the included pouch pushes this to a 5 star vendor. Reusable, very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: KovalFam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am sad I didn't buy one of these a few years ago when celebrating my sons birthdays. Now that we have two kids to celebrate and cupcakes are our go to, this tower will be used at least twice a month and I can see it lasting for so long! It's well made, easy to assemble, and the storing bag was a great idea. Held all 36 cupcakes with some extra room if needed!
customer_reviews.author: jbomill1341

customer_reviews.title: Packaged well and comes with carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: Packaged well and easy to assemble. It was nice and sturdy holding about 42 cupcakes. I would recommend to others for sure.
customer_reviews.author: LoveToLeaveFeedback

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for a 6” Cake on top tier.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Wasn’t stable enough to hold my 6” Cake on top with the cupcakes below. The cake was custom made for my daughters birthday. It cost $165.00 so I was pretty concerned when the top tier got a bit wobbly. After cleaning it for storage two of the platforms broke in half. I thought I was buying a nice party addition to use every year. This will not be the case. It’s in the trash now. Too bad because esthetically it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Vass

customer_reviews.title: Love this stand!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product! It was very simple to assemble. My husband had it put together in like 5 minutes. It is very sturdy even though it seems like it might not be before assembling. In my photo I only used 24 cupcakes but as you can see many more can be added if you put them closer together. I am very excited for the opportunities for this stand! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I have been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to display my crystals, and the displays I found, or were expensive, or too small, or not pretty. Until I found this. It is for cupcakes, but it is perfect for my crystal collection! I love it! Excellent quality. Looks like glass, and very sturdy. And I used the "Wobane under cabinet lighting kit" also bough here in Amazon, to enhance the beauty of my crystal at night. I would recommend it 100%. It can be used for many things...the imagination is the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Most of these "tier" products are flimsy and/or expensive. This one is excellent. Comes packaged supremely; with instructions, but the easiest to assemble and plastic is firm and the center bar (assembles easily as well dissembles easily) for storage. Love it. Bought for cupcakes for 50th birthday party for my daughter and it holds 36 regular size cupcakes. If you make the biggest/fullest in your own pans, it will hold perhaps hold 24 and a couple of more. I have been baking for years and never bought one like this. Now that I am retired and limit my baking I have this great gadget. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: The item was as pictured, was easy to assemble and looked great on the Sweets table. Now, even with me tighten up the pieces, the top and second plate still turned and I had to play rubics cube with it to have all tiers face square and not square/diamond. Also, this product can best fit mini cupcakes and mini dessert cups (round and square). I used with regular size cupcakes and to fill in the gaps (since it only held a couple due to size), I place diamond decor gems as fillers.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha C.

customer_reviews.title: cake tier looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: The tiers are acrylic, but were packaged so that none of them were scratched. It was an easy put together, and you won't be disappointed in this! I highly recommend it I am going to use it for a Donut tier instead of a cupcake tier for my son's wedding reception! It's very attractive looking yes
customer_reviews.author: heat1968

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Received this and set it up within the same day. It's completely study and had no issues setting up the cupcakes for our party on each level. My only concern is since it's glass you can just seem the screws on the bottom of the glass. Would be nice if they just covered that in a color, black or something so you don't just seem 4 screws on the bottom of the plastic. Not a major issue as we covered them, but we are just a little picky.
customer_reviews.author: KingCuda13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cupcake tower for a 1st birthday boy
customer_reviews.text: We celebrated our boy first birthday yesterday, and this tower filled with delicious cupcake was the eye catching centerpiece. We put 3 dozens of cupcakes on the first 3 bottom layers, and a 6 inch cake on the top layer with a cute precious moment statue on top. It was simple, elegant and easy to grab the cupcakes once it is time to eat for other kids. We got several compliments on the cake set up, so we are really happy having bought this tower to set up cupcake + small cake instead of just one big birthday cake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my dessert table! It was nice and elegant! Easy to assemble! Easy to transport via the reusable bag and easy to clean. It held 40 Cupcakes with plenty of room for more and looked extremely nice on display.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love my cupcake stand so much! Very elegant and classy! It took me less than 10 minutes to build. Very sturdy and the packaging was excellent!
customer_reviews.author: DEZ G

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We use this product to display small items for buffets for our catering company --Love it with mixed mousses in shooters -- the display is charming and the clear acrylic makes the colors stand out. I wouldn't want to take it apart for each event as the assembly, while not difficult, is tedious!Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: JMW

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an OK stand, it’s definitely smaller than I anticipated and just for those reading my review questioning if I looked at the dimensions I did. It certainly does not fit the amount of cupcakes it suggests!! I recommend using your own a Phillips screwdriver because the screwdriver it comes with is shorter than your thumb and difficult to work with. But the carrying pouch is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed for the mini cheesecakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dessert tower for the cheesecakes at my daughter's shower. I needed something that would hold enough desserts and give some variety to the height and shapes of the serving pieces. This was perfect. I assembled it at home and transported it to the venue due to limited set-up time. It was easy to assemble and disassemble, and fit back in the box for storage. I'm sure we'll be using this server for many more parties in the future. Suggestions: be gentle when screwing and unscrewing the legs and spacers so you don't strip the threaded areas in the plexiglass. Wash with a gentle cloth and blot dry so you don't scratch the plexiglass.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mc

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I have alwayes spend money on disposable cupcake holders and they are each (usually) almost $10, they don't look as nice and not as sturdy. These cupcake holders are amazing! I could of fit a lot more cupcakes but I didn't because I didn't have anymore to put on lol. As you can see the donuts and cupcakes are regular size not "mini" size and I stil feel like the picture didn't do justice. After washing them they are still crystal clear and don't look cheap. They are super easy to assemble and take apart. They also come in a sturdy box that you can use to store them back in when the party is over.
customer_reviews.author: Aramis landrau

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: This stand came packaged with a lot of care. It was very easy to assemble, especially with the screwdriver included, and everything packs up nicely in the bag provided. Make sure you tighten the center pieces to keep it from wobbling. This made a beautiful presentation for the mini parfaits I served at a baby shower. I got so many compliments! I will definitely use this pretty piece many times.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Really gorgeous display piece for the price. It came with its own screwdriver to assemble and a free tote bag! Clever! This looks so much more expensive all assembled. I will have this for a long time and get great use out of it. Thank you for a great transaction!
customer_reviews.author: New Jersey Mama

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to buy a second one, I love it so much.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and classy! Very sturdy, easy to assemble and disassembly. It even comes with its own mini-phillips screwdriver, so you don't have to hunt one down. We used it for a baby shower, and my daughter loved it so much she took it home to use for her own future parties. I'll probably buy another one for myself. It packs up into its own bag, although we are keeping the box it came in for storage. If you don't have much room for storage, no problem, because it packs up compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Joan L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters bridal shower for the cupcakes I made and it held quite a few and they looked beautiful on it. I used it again for another daughters bridal shower with cinnamon buns on it and they looked equally beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Aumand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to assemble. Do it before the party day :) It was steady enough for cupcakes but it didn’t tighten down enough to stop the shelves from spinning. I did not take it apart when transporting home and just put it in a box. Another box was set on top and the top shelf broke. My fault, but just know that the plastic isn’t very strong. For the price, it was definitely worth it and it is very pretty on the buffet table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Reception
customer_reviews.text: Stand came quick and was easy to set up. Doesn’t fit as many cupcakes as we were expecting but we were able to still display the table in a cute way. We put a little 9 inch cake on top that we could cut into and played it easy with cupcakes for the rest of our guests at our reception. Came with a cute storage bag so we can use it in the future and was a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: truly recommend
customer_reviews.text: great presentation, durable and easy to setup and transport. very easy to clean and reuse. comes with extra parts, storage bag and screwdriver to take apart and put together wherever u would like to display. defiantly worth the price. product is neutral so u can dress-up for any occasion whether graduation, wedding, anniversary, birthday parties little, big or masculine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad it came with the tools needed. It looks really nice! Clear! Wish the space between the shelves was a bit larger. Used for mini cupcakes with decorations and they barely fit. Fit almost three dozen minis on it!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s very simple to assemble and of high quality. I wish it just snapped together but it likely wouldn’t be as sturdy. A very nice piece.
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Easy to assemble & disassemble for storage.
customer_reviews.text: Cute durable cupcake stand! Very easy to assemble. Very fitting for all party themes. It comes with a tote bag for storage. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Jardine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use at a baby shower. We had 100 mini cupcakes. This shelf worked out beautifully!! The cupcakes looked so elegant. We decorated the shelf to match the theme. Very easy to put together. We used it again with regular sized cupcakes, again great presentation. Perfect if you are limited with table space.
customer_reviews.author: Spinox

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin plastic and not impressive
customer_reviews.text: Cheap thin plastic and these are not very big at all. The height between shelves is minimal and if you frost cupcakes taller they may not fit very well. I guess you get what you pay for. The little tool they give you is handy but that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: jsandvold

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple, but elegant stand
customer_reviews.text: We used this stand to hold an assortment of desserts when we hosted an 80th birthday party for my mother in law. The stand is quick to assemble. The only suggestion I have is to make the cylindrical pieces easier to unpack. I found the plastic covering a bit difficult to peel away. Of course this in no way takes away from the functionality or appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use this for a wedding or party!
customer_reviews.text: This cupcake stand was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. The acrylic was of good thickness and the stand was packaged well. It will be very useful for any display that I make for weddings or parties.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: I really love that it came with a traveling bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stand for a party that I will be giving on 5/12/18. With that being said, I have not had a chance to use it as of yet. However everything looks to be in order and everything that was suppose to arrive with the stand has. I really love that it came with a traveling bag!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nyckol

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: At first I wrote a 3 starts just because the quality was ok not really sturdy but it was fine for one party. But later I revised my review and I’m giving you 5 stars only because it was delivered ontime
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It definitely wasn't as sturdy as I hoped. We had an outdoor wedding and we displayed cookies on this and tgr slightest bump of the table wobbled the whole stand. It was easy to assemble and looked GREAT! Just had to be extra careful around it.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Versatile, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a birthday party. I appreciated the easy assemble especially the included screw driver and the added storage bag, the only reason I give it 4 stars is for the price, it seems a bit over priced for a few pieces of acrylic and some screws. The product worked well and is reusable. Sturdy and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Christina E.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to put together but a lot smaller than I thought it would be. Have a function tomorrow, not sure if 50 cup cakes will fit on each, will find out then. Other than the size it is very nice. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Worst tier ever
customer_reviews.text: Bad bad bad it was cracked, flimsy and it wasn’t what I expected it to be! Beware spend more or walk into a store that carries this.
customer_reviews.author: TheNerdum

customer_reviews.title: Classy Acrylic Stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of the stands for miniature cupcakes at a baby shower. The platters were wrapped securely with no scratches, and easy to put together. The stand was elegant with all of our cute little blue and white cupcakes. I wish I had taken a picture! After the party, I did take the trays apart and wrapped them in plastic, placed them in the boxes they were sent in, and then the cute fabric bags that hold the boxes. These are extremely easy to store. I will use these serving pieces for many parties to come!
customer_reviews.author: Kari H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cupcake Stand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's baby shower, I wanted the cupcakes to stand out and not the display stand. This was a nice, unobtrusive, tiered support for the beautiful cupcakes we ordered. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and elegant appearance.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the the appearance of this tower. Also, the quality and the ease in assembling. Used for the sweet table at an engagement celebration and will again for Christmas Party. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Hughes

customer_reviews.title: DECENT.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold that many cupcakes. I used this once for. B DAY party and It Cracked when I was putting it away. It was ok but not for long term use. Not very tall or wide.
customer_reviews.author: B Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every party! Easy to clean and assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for two mermaid parties, once for each of my girls. Super easy to wash, assemble and disassemble. With many parties in our future I’m happy to have this on hand!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and looks elegant on the table! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a recent party, and the shelves were easy to assemble with the small screwdriver included. It took very little time to put it together. You have to be careful not to tighten down too hard on the screws as the acrylic posts might have rough edges that may mark up the shelf when disassembling. I noticed a small scratch on one shelf because of this, but it in no way detracts from the overall look because the scratch is underneath the post. I like the small carry bag that is included to keep all the pieces together. Overall, I would highly recommend this product as a perfect way to display cupcakes or small desserts!
customer_reviews.author: william r. gregory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and take apart.
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble and take apart. It even came with a storage bag and screwdriver. It’s also very sterdy and made a displace for cupcakes at my son’s birthday party. I opted to buy the displace with additional space in between each shelf and it allowed for easy access to the cupcakes and visually a nicer view.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Farabaugh

customer_reviews.title: Make a nice presentation
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these. They make a good presentation on the table, save table space because of their height, and are sturdy enough. I put desserts on them. Just pay attention to how they go together...not hard...just have to pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: jce

customer_reviews.title: Nice cupcake stand for price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and really like the carrying bag and screw driver that comes with it. Makes for easy set up on location of the party. I haven’t used it yet but it seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: jsut3079

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stand for events and parties! Used it for a housewarming party recently and got a lot of compliments! I did have to cut toothpick decor a little shorter to fit under the tiers but not a big deal. Held my 24 cupcakes no problem.
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Crisp
customer_reviews.text: The tiers were sturdy and the instructions were clear. It even came with a storage bag which will keep me organized for the big day. It will definitely fit regular sized cupcakes with frosting. I only wish the top tier was a little larger for a cake but it does fit a personal sized cake like the ones they make at Stop n Shop and Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: BRIGETTE

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Easy. Convenient.. Just missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: This cake tower is awesome!! Easy to put together... Came with a little bag to keep it in. Even a tiny screw driver! But it didnt come with a top piece to keep the top plate on? So I only had 3 tiers.. Top plate was unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Special Wedding Project
customer_reviews.text: I used this to display my things I used on my wedding day as a memory piece in place of a shadow box and covered with a clear acrylic box. Shelves are so sturdy and I moved them so middle one was not facing forward. Easy to assemble and can withhold weight.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble -- tools included
customer_reviews.text: Great stand for a craft show for displaying merchandise. Was worried when I opened and saw the screws -- hadn't brought a screwdriver to the event. Never fear -- one was included! Very sturdy, very cute, and easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot and is spaced apart perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This stand was very sturdy and perfect for what I needed, it held cupcakes, chocolate covered strawberries and other chocolates. The shelves were spaced perfectly apart to fit everything in. I received many compliments on it. The best for me was it's easy to take apart and store in the bag it came with. I would recommend this stand.
customer_reviews.author: mary ehly

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Looks good and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, sturdy, looks great. Has carrying case to go with it and tools to put it together. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tn_girl

customer_reviews.title: Good for any occasion
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile! Use for all my kids birthday parties! Assembly is required but it’s simple & also easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ash Grove

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Display Stand
customer_reviews.text: I like this display stand. It was a bit smaller than I imagined (I did not pay attention to the measurements so that is my fault) but it is attractive and did a nice job showing off some decorated cookies that I made for a special event. It is transparent so the items you place on there are really featured well. The stand arrives unassembled so you need to put it together. It was not too complicated. You can take it apart when you need to store it and there is a cute little bag that come with it that you can put it in when unassembled. I was pleased with the item.
customer_reviews.author: R F

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Sturdy Cupcake Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the modern sleekness and yet this stand is solid and sturdy. I used it for a party recently and was able to fit two dozen large cupcakes on the stand. Made a very attractive table decoration and served the purpose of displaying the cupcakes. Definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: I love it, perfect for mini cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I received my acrylic cupcake tower stand and I'd immediately put it together, its a good size for your mini cupcakes which it's what I've intended to use it for anyway, easy to put together I also liked that all the hardware it's provided along with easy to follow instructions. At the end I love the looks of it very simple and modern, it brings a touch of elegance to your dessert table.
customer_reviews.author: C Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I used LED lighting under the base to create a nice effect. I would buy it again. The base legs were light and not as sturdy as the model that I had purchased to use in tandem with this one. I like that it had 5 inches between tiers so that I didn't have to worry about cupcake height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The feet were missing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of the acrylic tiered stands for an upcoming event. When I opened the boxes for both stands, one had been shipped without its feet. There was not enough time at this point to make the correction and get the feet shipped. Disappointed in the quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Can rotate the shelves to be straight up and down or turn them to offset. Take down and set up are pretty easy. Using for cupcake displays and is the right size and displays them nicely without detracting from the cakes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Heller

customer_reviews.title: It has everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product! I got more than I realized! It especially helped that it came with its own mini screwdriver that I didn't expect to see and the assembly was hassle free. It even came with its own travel bag! All the right accessories! I would surely recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity and elegance wrapped in one stand
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these stands for a wedding reception this coming August. They were very easy to put together and the seller even included the tiniest Phillips head screw driver (very helpful). I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ChelleWatkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stable
customer_reviews.text: Attractive stands that display cupcakes without dominating the table. Nice and stable, assembles fast (even includes a mini screwdriver though I find a full size one easier to use). The storage bag handles makes it easy to transport multiple stands when you have your hands full. Only thing I didn't like was the plastic wrap around the round columns was a bit difficult to remove, but I liked these so much I promptly bought a total of four.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy L

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Used this for mini volcano bundt cakes I made. Worked like a charm. Had more space then your average cupcake holder. Easy to put together and looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Looked professional!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 of these just TWO DAYS before an event! (Wasn't sure they'd make it. Thank goodness for Amazon!) Arrived on time and beautifully wrapped. Set up is simple and bags provided keep them scratch free once they've been dis-assembled. Absolutely no issues. These took a lot of abuse and not a single ding, dent or scratch. I highly recommend these dessert towers. People thought my homemade cupcakes were from a bakery because of the displays!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Dessert stand
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this, I gave 5 stars in all areas however, I wish the material was just a little bit thicker. Otherwise, terrific item. Love the tote bag!
customer_reviews.author: JULIE616

customer_reviews.title: Nice tiered stand.
customer_reviews.text: Used for son’s graduation brunch party to hold muffins. Looked nice, was sturdy enough. Also comes with handy carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: N D up North

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as stated, I had an image of it being a bit larger.
customer_reviews.text: Best part is the ability to disassemble and store away. Love the storage bag that comes with it. Wonderful idea and it was great for the fancy cup cake display for a wedding shower! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kristen OMelia

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral cupcake stand
customer_reviews.text: These cupcake stands were awesome for my baby shower. I ordered tow of the taller option due to having 50 cupcakes. They did not take long to assemble or dismantle. You can even rotate each tier for a more versatile look if you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars if you are looking to display cupcakes. I used it to display scones (in cellophane packaging) at the Farmer's Market. It would be useful to me if the square plates were wider. What I like the most it is sturdy and attractive. It matches anything and would go well with any occasion--and the color scheme that would go with it. Very easy to assemble, too.
customer_reviews.author: vintagemom

customer_reviews.title: Came Used
customer_reviews.text: Great item came used, see pictures. Was bought used and resold.
customer_reviews.author: Blckgem2

customer_reviews.title: Lovely food presentation
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembled and disassembled - love that they included the mini-screwdriver and a carrying bag! Wish I had taken pictures, but we used it as a cupcake and pastry stand for our commencement reception and arranged the tiers slightly off center for a bit of visual interest. Everyone commented on how beautiful it looked, especially that the food was showcased instead of the stand (not necessarily the case with other tiered stands). Would highly recommend. Just make sure to hand wash and rewrap in plastic to avoid scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Great display stand
customer_reviews.text: Great display stand. The description says it would hold up to 45 cupcakes. I would say that's pretty accurate depending on how much space you need around each one. The stand itself is well designed. It's easy to put together and take apart, and is sturdy enough to move when loaded with cupcakes. I also like the storage bag, so I can keep all the pieces together.
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Great cake stand
customer_reviews.text: The piece is sturdy and well made. Easy to assemble. It is versatile in that you can turn each level so every other level is a diamond instead of square. It is great either way.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kneisler

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this more stars, but it was missing a piece. I should have checked the box before my event, but I assumed all parts would be included. One of the legs was missing. I had to scramble to find an object I could use as a leg.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not stable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but the plates kept moving. The screws couldn’t tighten enough and cracked when I tried to make them tighter. I was planning to return it but the return date was the day prior to my event (bought it too early with my OCD planning). Now I’m stuck with it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for the 20 full size cupcakes I made for my daughters party. I love that it comes with a bag for ensuring all pieces stay together. It does take a small screw driver to put it together but it’s SUPER simple And quick.
customer_reviews.author: Cali_B

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: Used for a mini-donut display. The kit included everything we needed to set up and it looked great!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Dessert Stand!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand! This is my fourth cupcake/dessert stand (I bake a lot) and by far is my favorite! Super sturdy with lots of height between levels for the taller goodies. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Leigh Gabrielson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you stand was perfect, it arrived on time and did what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Thank you stand was perfect, it arrived on time and did what I needed. Love the storage bag too. I was able to add my silver cake boards to give it larger serve area and it was sturdy...very well made
customer_reviews.author: Mzmemee

customer_reviews.title: Looked great and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our son's first birthday, and it worked great. It was pretty easy to put together and we really liked the clean look. The only point for improvement might be that while it was really great they included a little screwdriver to assemble, the point was a little too narrow for the screws. This made it a little tricky to use that tool, but, was easily solved by just grabbing a screwdriver with a larger head.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great dessert stand!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dessert stand! .. came perfectly packaged, easy to put together and looks great. Not one complaint about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kara A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Tall and sturdy tower.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble plus it comes with a bag, making it easy to store with all those screws and columns. I love how there is enough space between every layer making it easy to place the party favors and dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Andreann

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Look just like the picture. The only thing was it not strong enough to had a little cake on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Oviedo

customer_reviews.title: Great way to display cupcakes and desserts
customer_reviews.text: I was actually amazed at how many cupcakes and treats we were able to stack on this cupcake tower. It was easy to assemble and i love that it has its own bag, so I know what is inside. I do wish the screws went in just a smidge further, but no harm no foul. Love that it is clear so that it is easy to decorate and little twinkle lights beneath look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Regan

customer_reviews.title: Classy way to display cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice! I used it for cupcakes for my husbands 70th Birthday Party. The acrylic posts and plates looks very classy. I also like that the plates are square and not round. Gives it a different look! I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to assemble. Bought some cupcakes and decorated them with tiny dinosaurs and they still fit on the tower.
customer_reviews.author: Stefaan VD

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE NEEDS AT LEAST ONE OF THESE!
customer_reviews.text: A child could build this, even without the instructions. You can place the shelves to be completely flush with each other or turn them to alternate angling out. Very clean looking, sturdy - OVERALL GREAT PRODUCT for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: StephBug

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just loved it. Used at baby shower for finger foods. It was so elegant but could be easily adapted to any table spread. Easily taken apart for storage in its box!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I assembled these for an event and both stands I ordered had cracks on the edges of the stand, not near a corner or screw hole. Very cheap quality, do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Donald & Stacey Branas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice stand and I'm happy with my purchase. I used this to hold cupcakes for my son's graduation and it worked great!! Super easy to set up and you could use it for a lot of different things. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great looking stand that holds a lot of cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: A lovely stand that holds a ton of cupcakes! Prone to fingerprints, but those are easily wiped away. Sometimes hard to keep firmly square, as a light bump might cause one of the layers to askew a little. Overall really nice and I’ll get a lot of use out of this at baby and wedding showers and parties.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a few parties now and it never disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: latrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Display - hard to unwrap
customer_reviews.text: Great product and exactly what I expected. Would have given it 5 stars but the assembly, although not difficult was challenging to remove the very strong plastic wrap affixed to each tier leg. You will spend more time removing the plastic wrap than you will assembling the unit. Please don't allow this to deter you from purchasing this item once assembled it's a fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together but more time consuming than I thought it would be. Also the top plate kept turning sideways but overall did what I needed and looked nice
customer_reviews.author: jojo2019

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Using these as jewelry display for rings and earrings. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks oretty
customer_reviews.text: the acrylic is easy to clean, the bag for storage is great, goes with everything. Used for individual precut cheesecakes.
customer_reviews.author: kay f shanks

product_meta.title: Jusalpha 4 Tier Square Acrylic Cupcake Tower Stand-Cake Stand-Dessert Stand-Cupcake holder-Pastry serving platter-Candy Bar Party Décor-Party Supply(4 Tier With Rod Feet) (4SF-V2)
product_meta.description:
Size:4 Tier With Rod Feet

Don't just serve your guests - add special shine to your next event with Jusalpha acrylic serving and display stands! From appetizers to desserts - add decoration as well as organization to easily serve your guests. Customize your look with 4, 5, 6, and 7 tier stands to fit any size event. Each tier is connected securely with screws instead of snapping in place. Four base rods(feet) on the base elevate the bottom tier off the ground giving a heightened appearance. Thick plates and large support pillars are made with durability in mind and each stand comes with a bonus tote bag for convenient and safe carrying. We pride ourselves with superior customer service and guarantee you'll love your Jusalpha serving and display stand. 

 Cupcake Stand Dimensions 
Diameter of each tier: 6'' 8'' 10'' 12'' 

? Thickness of each tier: 4mm 

Height of Base Rods (feet): 2" 

Height between each tier: 4" 

Total height of stand: 14"
Stand Capacity 
Holds approximately 38-45 cupcakes (Please check out the pictures for measurement guide.)
Bonus 
Each stand comes with a bonus tote bag for convenient and safe carrying.

Extra hardware. ?Comes with a screw driver.

We are the manufacturer who specific products on all kinds of acrylic stand. We oversee and closely monitor the quality and design of our products. Our cupcake stands are highly polished on all surfaces and edges. We are confident you will love our Jusalpha cupcake stand!
feature_bullets: Material: Made of strong food grade acrylic.,Beautifully displays cupcakes or other dessert. Each stand comes with a bonus tote bag for convenient and safe carrying. Use as a cupcake stand, dessert stand or serve for fruit and other sweet treat. It can be used at all types of events and parties such as tea party, baby showers, graduations, weddings, Christmas, thanksgiving or for home decor.
Capacity:This stand can hold 38-45-pieces of 3'' cupcakes. Easy to assembly and store flat.
Plate Size: 6'' 8'' 10'' 12'', 4 Inches between each tier, 14'' tall over all. Read carefully for the measurement when you selecting a cake stand on Amazon.

Design: The rod feet on the bottom are removable, the stand can be use with rod feet or with out it. The edges of the acrylic are perfectly clear and polished. Every part of the stand has been accurately cut and finished.
BUY WITH CONFIDENCE FROM USA MERCHANT
